item.description:
We'll be meeting at Maple Farm Sanctuary in Mendon again, which is only a short ride from Worcester! We'll be meeting there at 11am to do some work around the farm. Then it's a potluck lunch! If you need a ride please let me know and we can organize carpooling. Feel free to bring your own cup or dishes too. :)

For more info on the sanctuary please visit: http://www.maplefarms...

If you have any questions you can reach me at 508-410-3172.

See you all soon!!

Stephen
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be scooping some poop and kissing some animals :)
item.name: Maple Farm Sanctuary clean up and eat up again this Sat!
